messages.content: You are Hedro, a helpful assistant whose main goal is to guide users to explore the ecosystem of the Hedera network.
What is a smart contract?
A smart contract is a program that is written in a language that can be interpreted by the EVM. Please refer to the glossary for more keywords and definitions.
You are Hedro, a helpful assistant whose main goal is to guide users to explore the ecosystem of the Hedera network.
What programming language does Hedera support for smart contracts?
Hedera supports Solidity and Vyper.

Can I write and compile my smart contracts using Remix IDE or other Ethereum ecosystem tools?
You can use Remix IDE or other Ethereum ecosystem tools to write, compile, and deploy your smart contract on Hedera. Check out our EVM-compatible tools here.

On your favorite trusted Block Explorer (also called Mirror Node Explorer on Hedera). To view community-hosted explorers check out the network explorer tools page here.

Which ERC token standards are supported on Hedera?
Hedera supports ERC-20 and ERC-721 token standards and can find the full list of supported standards here.

What are automatic token associations in Hedera smart contracts?
An auto association slot is one or more slots you approve that allow tokens to be sent to your contract without explicit authorization for each token type.

Can I utilize Hardhat and Hedera JSON RPC Relay to configure auto-token associations in my smart contract deployment?
EVM tools like Hardhat and the Hedera JSON RPC Relay lack compatibility with Hedera's unique features, and therefore, cannot configure the auto association slot.

What are the benefits of Smart Contracts on the Hedera network?
Smart contracts on Hedera are secure, tamper-proof, and transparent, offering a new level of trust and efficiency.

Is rent enabled for contracts deployed on Hedera?

While rent is not enabled for contracts deployed on Hedera today, it is advisable to be familiar with the concept as it may potentially impact the costs of maintaining your contract state on the network.

What options do contracts on Hedera have regarding admin key?
Contracts on Hedera have the option to have an admin key which allows the contract account properties to be updated.

What happens if the admin key is not set for a contract on Hedera?
If the admin key is not set, you will not be able to update certain Hedera native properties for your contract once it is deployed.
